team.title: The Real People Behind DesignWorks
team.description: A bunch of designers, thinkers, and real people turning big ideas into visual victories.

team.name: Sarah Mitchell
team.bio: Sarah crafts brand plays that win markets and make fans out of audiences.

team.name: Emma Rodriguez
team.bio: Emma makes sure every project lands smoothly and keeps clients in the loop and happy.

team.name: Marcus Chen
team.bio: Marcus turns bold ideas into visual feasts with a sharp eye for detail and fresh designs.

team.name: Lisa Thompson
team.bio: Lisa weaves brand stories into digital and physical realms, ensuring a seamless user journey everywhere.
